summary: All six requirements appear to be implemented in the diff. REQ-1 (booking form fix with success animation, no auth barrier) is addressed in BookAppointmentDialog.tsx and useQueries.ts. REQ-2 (floating hero animation) is implemented in HeroSection.tsx with floatBob CSS keyframes in index.css. REQ-3 (magnetic buttons) is implemented via the new MagneticButton.tsx component used across Header, HeroSection, and service detail pages. REQ-4 (staggered text reveal) is implemented via the new useStaggeredTextReveal.ts hook used in multiple section components. REQ-5 (liquid gradient background) is implemented via the new LiquidGradientBackground.tsx rendered in App.tsx. REQ-6 (scroll progress bar) is implemented via the new ScrollProgressBar.tsx rendered in App.tsx. No significant missing requirements or hallucinated features are detected.
